quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Happiness is the best makeup.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
author: Anne Frank

quote: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: True happiness... is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
author: Helen Keller

quote: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help someone else.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Happiness held is the seed; happiness shared is the flower.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Saroyan

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
author: George Orwell

quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The mere sense of living is joy enough.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: Happiness is like a butterfly; the more you chase it, the more it will elude you.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
author: Richard Wagner
